dct_title_s: ATLANTIS INSULA à NICOLAO SANSON Antiquitati Restituta; Nunc demum Majori Forma delineata, et in decem REGNA, Iuxta decem Neptuni Filios Distributa. Præterea INSULÆ, NOSTRÆQ CONTINENTIS REGIONES quibus Imperavere ATLANTICI REGES; aut quas Armis Tentavere. ex Conatibus Geographicis
dct_description_sm: With changed imprint: AMSTELODAMI Apud PETRUM MORTIER Cum Privilegio. With ATLANTIS INSULA (top center, outside border) and engraved “87” (lower right, outside border).
LC 3283 & 5628; Tooley 51 & 52; Leighly 95; BN Sanson V D 208 (Fig.137); Nordenskïold Collection, 2, 275(53); Burden 405 (Plate 405).
California on second Sanson model, with indented northern coast; and with no place names.
Issued in: Atlas antiquus, sacer, ecclesiasticus et profanus ... / Joannes Clericus [Jean Le Clerc]. -- Amstelodami, Apud Petrum Mortier, [1705].
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
